participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I eat a slice of my favorite pizza to cheer up. I cannot stand clutter or dust. I'm a teacher who enjoys baking, but keeps it a secret from my parents. I enjoy taking late night walks when it's completely dark. My sisters are visiting this weekend, so I am looking forward to spending time with them and making new memories.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.background: I am a mystery buff and live in London. I am not rich, but I am fortunate enough to have parents who support my passion for filmmaking. I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots. I have a collection of rocks and minerals from all over the world. I wake up early, work a full day, then practice my music in the evening.

content.text: Hi, I'm looking forward to spending time with my sisters this weekend.
That's great! How many sisters do you have?
Oh cool, I'm an only child so I've always been curious about what it's like to have siblings.
It can be fun and challenging at the same time. I'm not sure how I would have turned out without them.
I can imagine. I think I would have been pretty lonely without siblings.
Me too. So what do you like to do for fun?
Oh cool! I've always wanted to make a movie.
It's a lot of fun, but it can also be a lot of work.
I can imagine. Do you have any movies that you're particularly proud of?
I have a short film that I made that I'm really proud of.
Oh cool! I'd love to see it sometime.
Yeah, I can send you a link.
